title: Where skyline views, modern luxury, and amenities seamlessly merge.
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Modern', 'First impressions are everything.', 'From the gracious greeting you will receive upon arrival to the natural materials and finishes that act as an extension of the surrounding beauty, every detail has been carefully curated.', 'Expansive window lines create an environment that inspires imagination and a living experience where every moment is elevated.', 'Welcome to The Modern.', 'Beginning on the 13th floor, every one of our residences has a breathtaking panoramic view of Elliott Bay or the Seattle skyline with striking floor-to-ceiling windows.', 'Because if you’re going to have a view, it might as well be the best.', 'The Conservatory is the heart of the building.', 'An exclusive club hall for a vertical neighborhood.', 'While other residences offer standard amenities, we go a step further and hand-select each element to not only give you the feeling of home, but elevate it.', 'Our suite of amenities includes The Conservatory which is made up of six unique spaces that enliven two floors of the building: The Foyer, The Bar, The Video Wall, The Club Room, The Loft, and multiple private dining / executive board rooms.', 'The immediate area is rich with dozens of cultural attractions, restaurants and nightlife options within walking distance, placing The Modern at the front steps of recreation.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Laundry and dry-cleaning services', 'Package service and in-home delivery', 'In-home personal bartender', 'Children’s Studio with day care available', '24-hour front desk coverage', 'Car washing and in-house luxury car share', 'View dome butler service', 'Paddleboard and bike rentals', 'Restaurant reservations and recommendations', 'After-hours snack menu', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
